00019 #include <co/object.h>
00020 #include <co/objectVersion.h>
00021 
00022 namespace co
00023 {
00027 template<>
00028 inline DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const std::string& str )
00029 {
00030     const uint64_t nElems = str.length();
00031     _write( &nElems, sizeof( nElems ));
00032     if ( nElems > 0 )
00033         _write( str.c_str(), nElems );
00034 
00035     return *this;
00036 }
00037 
00039 template<> inline
00040 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const Object* const& object )
00041 {
00042     LBASSERT( !object || object->isAttached( ));
00043     (*this) << ObjectVersion( object );
00044     return *this;
00045 }
00046 
00048 template< class T > inline
00049 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const lunchbox::Buffer< T >& buffer )
00050 {
00051     return (*this) << buffer.getSize()
00052                    << Array< const T >( buffer.getData(), buffer.getSize());
00053 }
00054 
00055 template< class T > inline
00056 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const std::vector< T >& value )
00057 {
00058     const uint64_t nElems = value.size();
00059     *this << nElems;
00060     for( uint64_t i = 0; i < nElems; ++i )
00061         *this << value[i];
00062     return *this;
00063 }
00064 
00065 template< class K, class V > inline
00066 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const std::map< K, V >& value )
00067 {
00068     const uint64_t nElems = value.size();
00069     *this << nElems;
00070     for( typename std::map< K, V >::const_iterator it = value.begin();
00071          it != value.end(); ++it )
00072     {
00073         *this << it->first << it->second;
00074     }
00075     return *this;
00076 }
00077 
00078 template< class T > inline
00079 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const std::set< T >& value )
00080 {
00081     const uint64_t nElems = value.size();
00082     *this << nElems;
00083     for( typename std::set< T >::const_iterator it = value.begin();
00084          it != value.end(); ++it )
00085     {
00086         *this << *it;
00087     }
00088     return *this;
00089 }

00091 template< class K, class V > inline
00092 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const stde::hash_map< K, V >& value )
00093 {
00094     const uint64_t nElems = value.size();
00095     *this << nElems;
00096     for( typename stde::hash_map< K, V >::const_iterator it = value.begin();
00097          it != value.end(); ++it )
00098     {
00099         *this << it->first << it->second;
00100     }
00101     return *this;
00102 }

00104 template< class T > inline
00105 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const stde::hash_set< T >& value )
00106 {
00107     const uint64_t nElems = value.size();
00108     *this << nElems;
00109     for( typename stde::hash_set< T >::const_iterator it = value.begin();
00110          it != value.end(); ++it )
00111     {
00112         *this << *it;
00113     }
00114     return *this;
00115 }

00117 template< typename C > inline
00118 void DataOStream::serializeChildren( const std::vector<C*>& children )
00119 {
00120     const uint64_t nElems = children.size();
00121     (*this) << nElems;
00122 
00123     for( typename std::vector< C* >::const_iterator i = children.begin();
00124          i != children.end(); ++i )
00125     {
00126         C* child = *i;
00127         (*this) << ObjectVersion( child );
00128         LBASSERTINFO( !child || child->isAttached(),
00129                       "Found unmapped object during serialization" );
00130     }
00131 }
00135 template<> inline
00136 DataOStream& DataOStream::operator << ( const std::vector< uint8_t >& value )
00137 { return _writeFlatVector( value ); }
